channel.title: Demethylation on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Demethylation on funPlantGenes

item.title: BrCCA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra004503 Gene Symbol: BrCCA1 Gene Name: CIRCADIAN AND CLOCK ASSOCIATED 1 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Vernalization-mediated demethylation of BrCKA2 (casein kinase II α-subunit) and BrCKB4 (casein kinase II β-subunit) shorten the period of the clock gene BrCCA1 (circadian clock associated 1) in Brassica rapa.

item.title: FaPE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPE1 Gene Name: pectinesterase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Concerning hormone regulation, auxin treatment increased FaPE1 mRNA levels in green fruit, whereas exogenous ethylene decreased FaPE1 mRNA levels in ripe and senescing fruits.

item.title: NAC-NOR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g006880 Gene Symbol: NAC-NOR Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: NaPME1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaPME1 Gene Name: putative pectin methylesterase Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Pectin methylesterase NaPME1 contributes to the emission of methanol during insect herbivory and to the elicitation of defence responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: OsALKBH1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g60190 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0816500 Gene Symbol: OsALKBH1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsCTF
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g19210 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0296100 Gene Symbol: OsCTF Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsDML4
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g13070 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0237900 Gene Symbol: OsDML4 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpFAD3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G056100 Gene Symbol: PpFAD3-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Peach fruit PpNAC1 activates PpFAD3-1 transcription to provide ω-3 fatty acids for the synthesis of short-chain flavor volatiles.

item.title: ZmROS1b;mdr1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb202980 Gene Symbol: ZmROS1b mdr1 Gene Name: maternal derepression of R1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZmWAK02;ZmWAKL03
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb034290 Gene Symbol: ZmWAK02 ZmWAKL03 wakl3 Gene Name: wall-associated receptor kinase-like3 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
